column4: hi... while installing kubuntu It has asked me to select a default display manager.... if i chnage that to kde can i chnage it back later?
how do i chnage my default desktop manager if i have kde and gnome and ever want to chnage between the 2?
when you login, you can choose either kde or gnome under 'session', and it should ask if you want to make the new choice the default
no problem, you can change it later at the login screen
